Description:
Ideal first home or investment opportunity
Located in the popular Pasadena Estate sits this lovely 3 bedroom family home. Whether you're a first home buyer, investor or simply looking to down-size, here is an opportunity which should definitely not be missed!
Features include:
- Spacious master bedroom with its very own full ensuite & walk-in robe plus a further two secondary bedrooms which are both generous in size and feature double built-in robes
- The modern kitchen showcases stylish stainless steel appliances which includes a dishwasher in addition to stone benchtops and overlooks the spacious dining & family living zone
- Inside flows smoothly through to outside via glass sliding door from the family area. The covered entertainment zone has plenty of room for the fun summer barbeques while also providing a more intimate setting for a low key dinner party with your nearest & dearest.
- Further inclusions: neutral tones throughout, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, down lights, low maintenance gardens
The location is just perfect with parklands, Shopping on Clyde and bus services close by and with easy access to schools such as St. Peter's Secondary College, Wilandra Primary School & Clyde Primary School. What are you waiting for? Call now Matt Dewan or Brent Day to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Modern Home, Generous Living!
Waiting and ready for you to move in, this spacious and modern home consists of 3 bedrooms, an open plan living, kitchen and dining area, a home theatre room, and a home office/study, or potentially a fourth bedroom.
The outdoor paved entertaining area features stackable glass doors that open and welcome in plenty of natural light. It's clever design allows the host to always be a part of the party.
Boasting neutral soft greys throughout, and contemporary floorboards, the deluxe kitchen is comprised of stunning 20mm Caeserstone benchtops, a 900mm oven/gas stove top, a walk-in-pantry, a dishwasher, and an inbuilt LG stainless-steel double door icemaker fridge.
All 3 bedrooms are carpeted, include ceiling fans, built-in-robes, and block-out-blinds to help keep out the heat. The Master bedroom has a walk-in-robe, and a full ensuite with a double vanity.
The remote-controlled double lock up garage includes internal access straight into the main hallway for added security, and a convenient way to bring in your shopping.
The front and rear yards come with a low maintenance design including a garden shed, garden beds, a fully enclosed cat run or extra secure storage for motorbikes, jet skis and more.
Other highlights include ceiling fans to all living areas, airconditioning, ducted heating, security mesh on all windows and doors, and monitored CCTV.
Perfect for growing families, you could even convert the home theatre room, and the home office/study into an additional 2 bedrooms.
Only 2 years old and still under builders warranty (7 years), this is a rare offering in a great location. Call Jennifer Ryder on 0490042412 today.
Features:
2-Bedrooms with Built-in-Robes
Master Bedroom includes Walk-in-Robe & Full Ensuite
Open Plan Living, Kitchen and Dining
Outdoor paving Entertainment area
Kitchen includes Caeserstone Benchtops and Dishwasher
Security Mesh on all Windows and Doors
Ceiling Fans in Bedrooms and Living Areas
Double Lock Up Garage

Description:
Perfect Start to 2019
Would you love to live in a custom design home that is unique and stands out of the crowd?
Look no further.
This designer home with high ceilings plus vaulted ceiling in kitchen/meals/living makes living a bit luxurious
Designed with comfort and practicality in mind, this home offers large front living space moment you walk through the front door, spacious master bedroom with walkin robes & ensuite, study-nook, walkin pantry, modern kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, pendent lights over the island benchtop, ample cupboard space, spacious meals and living space that opens to a private alfresco, three more spacious bedrooms with their own separate bathroom & toilet
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
This home offers
- Vaulted ceiling in Living
- High ceilings to the rest of home
- Downlights in Hallway, Living, Kitchen, Meals and Family
- Ducted Heating
- Evaporated Cooling
- Stone benchtops in Kitchen, Bathroom & ensuite
- Pendent lights over island benchtop
- 900mm five burner Gas Cooktop
- 900mm Oven
- Dishwasher
- Walk-in Pantry
- Study-nook
- Front and back landscaping
- Double garage with panel lift garage door
- Panel lift remote double garage
- Driveway
- Fencing
This home is located short distance from
- Park with playground
- Clyde Shopping center (Coles and Restaurants)
- McDonalds in Clyde
- KMart Auto Repair center
- Clyde Medical center
- Selandra Rise Shopping center (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Medical Center, AMCAL pharmacy, restaurants)

and many more conveniences

Description:
Titled 400m2 Land in Edgebrook Estate
This perfect block of 400 sq. m. land is located in a prime, thriving and beautifully placed Edgebrook Estate in the highly sought out and well-established suburb, 'Clyde'.
Edgebrook Estate offers brilliant opportunities and facilities for the proud future residents which will surely impress:
*This is close to fantastic schools, shopping, childcare, community centres. Within Edgebrook are planned parks with playgrounds, BBQ's and public artworks.
*This is just 5 minutes away from two shopping centres with supermarkets and specialty stores. Westfield Fountain Gate is a simple 20-25 minute drive.
*Planned creek-front walkways and bikeways within the community will encourage active lifestyles. Situated in the Casey Council area, countless recreational and sporting facilities are nearby.
*Medical care is nearby, at Amstel Medical Centre and Cranbourne Park Family Care Clinic. Casey Hospital (public) in Berwick is only a short 18 minute drive away.
*Edgebrook is located close to a number of highly regarded private and government, primary and secondary schools.
This spectacular block of perfectly rectangular land offers impressive dimensions:
- 400 sq.m block
- Titled & Ready to build
Frontage: 12.5 m
Depth Right: 32 m

Description:
**SOLD BY PAUL RINGERI**
ELISTON ESTATE, CLYDE: Searching for a tranquil location? Requiring an estate offering family friendly living? Your wish is my command!
This spacious, titled allotment is truly a prime piece of real estate and provides the perfect foundation to create your dream home whilst enjoying the quality lifestyle on offer in Eliston. Measuring a generous 512m2 (frontage of 16m with a depth of 32m) the land itself is regular in shape. The extra wide frontage allows the option for side access and with plenty of award-winning designs to pick from any builder would have a huge selection of floor plans sure to suit your current situation. The level nature of the land is bound to assist in keeping the site costs down, so what are you waiting for? Call your builder today and get ready to start pouring the slab!
Nestled within an expanding development with completed parks and walking tracks, the location offers a great environment for a young or growing family. There are even future plans for a primary school and a town centre!
Eliston is an estate that is within a short drive to freeway access and all of the amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. You are also only minutes away from the existing Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and the Casey Indoor Sports Centre. With additional shopping precincts on offer in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by. The recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre also features an abundance of funky cafes and restaurants. Don't forget the proposed Cranbourne East train station and the existing ones situated right throughout the South East!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
CONTACT US TO ARRANGE FOR A TIME TO VIEW THE SECTION 32 VENDOR STATEMENT!

Description:
Investors,first home buyers look no further!
If you're after a low maintenance near new home then, don't look past this one
Located in the beautiful Hartleigh Estate this near new property is an excellent opportunity for first home buyers' investors or downsizers.
The home offers a great sense of space with a study nook, central family bathroom, sperate laundry, and an open plan kitchen meals and family area.
The kitchen boasts a walk-in pantry, stainless steel appliances and stone benchtops with a breakfast bar and looks out over the backyard.
The master bedroom has a walk-in robe and stylish ensuite, while the remaining two bedrooms have built in robes.
The single remote garage has internal access to the home, gardens have been completed, and ducted heating will keep you comfortable on the cold winter nights
This is a property not to be missed currently rented for $1543.00 per calander month to a great tenant but also available with vacant possession.

Titled Land - Wide Frontage!
North facing premium titled land with approx. 17.50 mt frontage is ready for you to construct your dream home in a location your family & friends will envy. Located in one of the most prominent and sought-after estates, Hartleigh offers beautiful park that not only provides a stunning outlook for neighbouring homes, but also encourages residents to gather together and enjoy the outdoors. Featuring:
-545 sqm (approx.) land size
-Close to Lake - THE PAVILION
-Picnic areas, walking tracks and Tennis Club

Whether it's a picnic with friends and neighbours or just a quiet, twilight stroll while the kids run around the playground, Hartleigh is about building a new community.
Call Yogi Patel on 0451 719 161 for further details!

Situated on a healthy 434m2 approx. allotment within the popular "Pasadena Estate", this impressive family home is perfect for those seeking a contemporary lifestyle with all the modern must haves!
A zoned floor plan comprising of 4 bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe, two light filled living areas plus dining area, sparkling galley style kitchen equipped with stone bench tops, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher!
Further emphasising both ducted heating and evaporative cooling, genuine double garage with remote entry and internal access plus an impressive alfresco area adjacent to a private rear yard - making it perfect for year-round entertaining.

Description:
Hartleigh - The New Heart of Clyde
This carefully crafted boutique community offers an extensive array of amenities. A dedicated fitness precinct that boasts individual stations scattered along the tree lined running track. Wynnstay Central Park features an amazing playground, barbecue facilities and two large wetland areas.
Hartleigh is just five kilometres from all the amenities in Cranbourne including Cranbourne Park shopping centre, Casey Fields sporting complex and within two kilometres of St Thomas the Apostle Primary School and Casey Grammar High School.
Become a part of this fast growing community in this lovely three bedroom plus study/fourth bedroom, two bathroom home. Offering an open plan design to hostess kitchen, with a 900mm gas, five burner oven, stainless steel rangehood and dishwasher, overlooking the spacious living and dining areas.
Additional features include gas ducted heating, outdoor entertaining area and double garage on remote with internal access.

Description:
Brand new, 2 living areas + loads of upgrades
Welcome to 58 Chesney Circuit, Clyde found in well sought after Belmond on Clyde Estate. This meticulously presented Adenbrook home provides more than enough accommodation to cater for the growing family and is perfect for those who love to entertain. You simply can't beat the convenient location, quality upgrades and appliances plus the fantastic entertainer's area on offer.
Comprising of:
- Spacious Master suite with separate WIR plus en-suite with twin vanity.
- Three more generous bedrooms all with BIR's.
- TWO separate living areas to enjoy– a formal lounge/ theatre room as well as an open plan living/ meals area at the rear overlooking the alfresco.
- Stunning designer kitchen with plenty of upgrades such as ceaserstone benches, dishwasher, 900mm oven with 5 burner gas cooktop, gloss cabinetry, under mount sink, built in microwave, breakfast bar and walk in pantry.
- Separate study nook with data point – perfect if you work from home or need space for the kids to do their homework.
- The outdoor of this home offers a great place to enjoy time with friends and family – stacker doors open up to a generous undercover alfresco
- Double garage with internal access to the home.
Extras include: Ducted heating AND evaporative cooling, downlights, high ceilings, quality carpet, caeserstone benches and shower niches to both bathroom and en-suite, pivot entrance door, exposed aggregate driveway and much, much more..
On top of the quality upgrades, contemporary design & street appeal this home offers, you'll also love all the abundance of facilities at your fingertips. Belmond is situated in the heart of the fastest growing suburb of Clyde and is only moments away from central Cranbourne and Berwick. Lush parks and open spaces make family time a breeze plus there is easy access to Shopping on Clyde, schools such as Clyde Primary, sports and recreation facilities– it's got it all.
With nothing to do but move in and enjoy – we know you will fall in love! Why would you go through the hassle of building? And first home-buyers, you can also take advantage of first home owners grant and stamp duty concessions. Please contact us to organise your inspection before it's gone!
*Please note that the landscaping in the main image is only an artist's impression however landscaping of the property and fencing will be completed prior to settlement of the home.
Insights: 58 Chesney Circuit, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
A LIFESTYLE TO DELIGHT – PARK FRONTAGE
Located within the beautifully landscaped surrounds of Eliston Estate, this 507m2 titled block offers a fabulous opportunity to realise your luxury home dreams.
Be quick to secure this titled parcel of land in this highly desirable family location. The block is amongst the beautiful, tranquil landscape of ELISTON in Clyde where dairy farms and market gardens all flourish, this stunning new estate is rich in history that will nourish the lives of all who live there.
Eliston offers a unique lifestyle including its own town centre with shops and cafe, and a new primary school and childcare centre within safe strolling distance. A brilliant outdoor lifestyle awaits with 11ha of green space, 3 ovals and 4 parks, bike lanes, a train station on the way, fast internet access and more.

Description:
WHY BUILD WHEN YOU CAN HAVE ALL THIS...?
Just 1 year old and completely finished right down to the stunning professional landscaping, this home on a corner block in the blossoming Belmond on Clyde' estate begs one simple question - why build when you can simply move in, relax and enjoy?
Expertly built by Metricon these owners have taken it a step further with stunning garden surrounds including a freshly finished front garden that complements the brick and rendered façade perfectly.
Amassing around 21sq, this a first home buyers delight it features a formal lounge/dining room with ethanol fireplace and an open family/meals area adjoining the kitchen with stainless appliances and stone benches.
There are three robed bedrooms as well as 2 stylish bathrooms including a full ensuite in the main bedroom.
Ducted heating and LED lighting are also included while outside you find a double garage with remote door and a gorgeous and fully finished backyard with two decks, a shed and an edible garden with apples, veggies and herbs.
In an estate with great parks and walking tracks, you are also within minutes of Casey Fields and local shops with schools, buses and central Cranbourne all just minutes away.

Description:
Ready Set Go
Positioned in the popular Edgebrook Estate, you know this is the block you have been waiting for to build your dream home. 350m2 approx. with 12m frontage in a thriving new Clyde community. Edgebrook is perfect for family living, featuring planned parks with playgrounds, BBQ's and public artworks. It's an estate where community spirit will thrive. The carefully designed masterplan and future central park focus on bringing the community together. Creek-front walkways and bikeways within the community will encourage active lifestyles, whilst there are countless recreational and sporting facilities nearby, shopping on Clyde and easy access to Melbourne.
Insights: 18 Mississippi Avenue, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
North Facing 14x32 Block To Build Your Dream Home!
Great opportunity to secure this 448m2 (14x32 approx.) block of land in the famous Edgebrook Estate in Clyde. Everything you need is within easy reach. Ideally located close Cranbourne train station, primary and secondary schools, shops and amenities. Wonderfully positioned Edgebrook is set between Tuckers and Pattersons Road, Clyde.
To secure this opportunity Call Vicky Arora on 0430205545
